Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to the next occurrence of SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Declined and SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same case
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes to perform SW-AE Assign Reviewers after SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average cycle time of SW-Reviewer Declined when followed by Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Total elapsed time from SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Reviewer Declined in variants that include repeated reviewer assignment attempts
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Reviewer Selection is now due
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Minimum time between consecutive occurrences of SW-Reviewer Declined in the same case
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time it takes to reach SW-Awaiting EIC Decision after the last occurrence of SW-Reviewer Declined in a case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Reviewer Agreed in cases where at least three reviewer invitations were sent
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to Assign a Different Editor when editor reassignment occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Reviewer Declined to Unassign Reviewer in variants involving reviewer unassignment
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Unassign Reviewer'

Name: Average time between SW-Reviewer Declined and SW-Reviewer No Response in cases with no further reviewer agreement
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Total time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-AE Recommendation overdue in delayed recommendation paths
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Recommendation overdue'

Name: Average cycle time of SW-Reviewer Declined in variants leading to SW-EIC Major Revision versus SW-EIC Reject
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Reviewer Declined to the subsequent Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation in multi-round revision cases
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
